name: ICTG - Indoor cycling the Game ~ Alpha
name_original: ICTG - Indoor cycling the Game ~ Alpha
description:
Indoor Cycling The Game

ANT+ power sensor required (for now, let me know what kind of sensor you would like to see to be included)

At the moment in concept state. ANT+ power sensor is working for me well and registering the power and cadence measurement.

Hardware I use:

USB Garmin ANT+ stick
FAVERO Assioma UNO power pedal. (using open ANT+, so anything which supports the standard messages should work well)

in development let me know in comments what would you like to have in the game
